category.name: Full Text Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_fts_realtime_index_dt_cache_size
preference.preference_description: Specifies the cache size (number of objects) for the real-time, full-text search dataset index actions. Valid Values: Any positive integer. Increase the value to cause fewer Autonomy calls to generate indexing and potentially remove duplicated objects.
